text: Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.

*Thoughts about a Translator:*
HubL Function :  translate(string, foo, bar)
Template : `{{ translate('Germany', 'en-US' , 'de-DE') }}` return: `'Deutschland'` else: `null`

*Background:*

I found this nice and useful database API, which give me the idea. Buts the translated countries names are missing in that DB, so I thought in some cases a translator function would be helpful. 
<https://www.back4app.com/database/back4app/list-of-all-continents-countries-cities>

I need the country names as a lookup table, to get additional information for a blog-tag. So if the blog article is tagged with "Deutschland" / Germany, I want to get Europe and an Emoji-Unicode or Flag Icon from the lookup table. In the end, there is a filter and sorting JavaScript based on isotope.js for the Blog-Listing pages. And now I have to bridge between German tags and the English database.
